title: How to treat people who treat you as an idiot - Quora

response.answer_text: I absolutely don't mind if someone treats me as an idiot! They unconsciously motivate me to do better in life. People will make fun of you whenever there is a possibility. So don't worry! Thats what human nature is! Don't get angry. Always remember, Be yourself . You know yourself well. So, don't try to change your nature for others. Keep doing your work silently. Let your success speak! Things you can do whenever people treat you as an idiot: Just don't get angry. Try to be normal and enjoy their jokes with them. This will somewhere strike their conscience and the insult will start acting opposite on them.Stay calm. Accept that you are an idiot. Its absolutely immaterial what they say. Just be honest with yourself and keep working hard. Let your success speak. Your success will be a sweet slap on their face.And remember, never insult anyone if you don't want that sweet slap! Cheers!

There are only two reasons the person treats you differently- They only know their way of talking; so for example if someone speaks slightly differently than them, they would not know how to respond. And when I say differently, I am in no way comparing better or worst.. I am just trying to suggest two people coming from different backgrounds and different understandings. The second reason which is more frustrating for the person at the receiving end is the egotistical tendencies of the person talking to you which is to say, the self conceited and boastful attitude which derives satisfaction from letting others down. How the two reasons different; the two reasons are different because of the intent. IN the first reason, the person is trying to make and effort to be understood. Whereas in the second reason the person is being conceited and selfish. THe best way to talk to these people is honesty in first case and courage to stand up; saying out clearly what you don’t appreciate.
